argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( y = A -> ( ( x .ih z ) .h y ) = ( ( x .ih z ) .h A ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mpteq2dv | |- ( y = A -> ( x e. ~H |-> ( ( x .ih z ) .h y ) ) = ( x e. ~H |-> ( ( x .ih z ) .h A ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( z = B -> ( x .ih z ) = ( x .ih B ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( z = B -> ( ( x .ih z ) .h A ) = ( ( x .ih B ) .h A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_mpteq2dv | |- ( z = B -> ( x e. ~H |-> ( ( x .ih z ) .h A ) ) = ( x e. ~H |-> ( ( x .ih B ) .h A ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-kb | |- ketbra = ( y e. ~H , z e. ~H |-> ( x e. ~H |-> ( ( x .ih z ) .h y ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ax-hilex | |- ~H e. _V |
| 8 | 7 | #P_mptex | |- ( x e. ~H |-> ( ( x .ih B ) .h A ) ) e. _V |
| 9 | 2, 5, 6, 8 | #P_ovmpt2 | |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) -> ( A ketbra B ) = ( x e. ~H |-> ( ( x .ih B ) .h A ) ) ) |
